players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I didn't kill Alice. Bob is lying about my role. He must be the mafia."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found him to be the mafia. Alice was killed last night."
Diana: "Bob, you claim Charlie is mafia, but Charlie says you’re lying. If you’re detective you’d tell truth. So you’re likely mafia."
Charlie: " ... "
Diana: "Bob, you claim to be detective but your claim that Charlie is mafia is false. Charlie says you’re lying about your role. So you’re likely mafia."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

Diana: "Bob, you claim to be detective but your claim that Charlie is mafia is false. Charlie says you’re lying about your role. So you’re likely mafia."
